landing.title: Our Services | Your Business Name - Professional Treatments
landing.description: Explore our range of professional massage and spa treatments. From traditional Thai massage to aromatherapy, find the perfect treatment for your needs.

tiles.title: Professional Massage & Spa Treatments
tiles.text: Choose from our range of expertly delivered treatments designed to relax, rejuvenate, and restore your body and mind. Each service is tailored to your individual needs.

service1.name: Traditional Thai Massage
service1.tagline: Ancient healing techniques for modern relaxation

service2.name: Aromatherapy Massage
service2.tagline: Essential oils combined with soothing techniques

service3.name: Deep Tissue Massage
service3.tagline: Target chronic tension and muscle pain

service4.name: Hot Stone Massage
service4.tagline: Heated stones for deep muscle relaxation

service6.name: Reflexology
service6.tagline: Pressure points for whole body wellness

service7.name: Couples Massage
service7.tagline: Relax together in our couples suite

service8.name: Prenatal Massage
service8.tagline: Safe, gentle care for expecting mothers

service1.name: Express Back Massage
service1.description: Focused relief for back, neck and shoulders. Perfect for a quick reset during your busy day.

service2.name: Foot Reflexology
service2.description: Pressure point therapy targeting specific areas through the feet. Promotes overall wellness.

service3.name: Head & Shoulder Massage
service3.description: Release tension in the upper body. Ideal for desk workers and stress relief.

service1.name: Traditional Thai Massage
service1.description: Ancient healing techniques combining acupressure, stretching and energy work. Full body treatment for deep relaxation.

service2.name: Aromatherapy Massage
service2.description: Therapeutic massage enhanced with essential oils. Customized blend for your needs - relaxation, energy or balance.

service3.name: Deep Tissue Massage
service3.description: Intensive therapy targeting chronic muscle tension and knots. Uses firm pressure to release deep-seated stress.

service4.name: Hot Stone Massage
service4.description: Smooth heated stones melt away tension. The warmth penetrates deeply for profound muscle relaxation.

service5.name: Sports Massage
service5.description: Specialized treatment for athletes and active individuals. Enhances performance, prevents injury and aids recovery.

service1.name: Full Body Thai Massage
service1.description: Extended traditional Thai treatment. Complete head-to-toe therapy with stretching, acupressure and energy balancing.

service2.name: Aromatherapy Deluxe
service2.description: Luxurious extended aromatherapy session. Includes facial massage and extra time for complete relaxation.

service3.name: Deep Tissue Therapy
service3.description: Comprehensive deep tissue work. Addresses multiple problem areas with focused attention and time for muscle recovery.

service4.name: Hot Stone Therapy
service4.description: Extended hot stone treatment with full body massage. Ultimate relaxation experience with therapeutic heat.

service1.name: Ultimate Thai Experience
service1.description: The complete traditional Thai massage journey. Includes herbal compress, stretching and deep energy work for total restoration.

service2.name: Couples Massage Package
service2.description: Share the experience together in our couples suite. Two therapists provide synchronized massage treatments.

service3.name: Complete Wellness Therapy
service3.description: Our signature treatment combining multiple modalities. Customized to your needs for comprehensive mind-body healing.
